name: First Sexy Night 2: Second Date
description:
First Sexy Night 2: Second Date is a short visual novel about your ongoing relationship with Ginny. You just lost your virginity to her and the whole world of sexual possibilities is wide open. The game picks up a few days after your first night together, where you both decide to do things slowly and make sure everything goes smoothly. However going slowly is easier said than done and you are horny as hell.

This game is a sequel to First Sexy Night and it offers a much deeper story with better writing and better sex scenes while keeping the familiar characters and their relationship, which is the backbone of the entire series. The game is designed to be completed in one sitting and is approximately 20 minutes long.



The features:
- Intimate story, which will not let you stop reading until you reach the end
- Multiple endings depending on how you play the game
- Steamy sex scenes.
- Lots of choices and consequences
- 5 different endings

Gameplay duration:
- The main storyline (reaching one ending) is approx. 20 minutes
- Getting all 5 endings and unlocking all achievements is approx. 1 hour
